1107.question: How big are the datasets used?
1107.response: {'Answer': 'The CMRC 2018 training set has 10,321 questions, and the development set has 3,219 questions. The DRCD training set has 26,936 questions, and the development set has 3,524 questions.'}
1107.answer:
Evaluation datasets used:
CMRC 2018 - 18939 questions, 10 answers
DRCD - 33953 questions, 5 answers
NIST MT02/03/04/05/06/08 Chinese-English - Not specified

Source language train data:
SQuAD - Not specified
